name: Wayne Gretzky and the NHLPA All-Stars
overview: Wayne Gretzky and the NHLPA All-Stars let you take on the world's best hockey players with incredible speed, remarkable finesse and lightning quick execution that burns the defense...and the net! Pick from 26 teams with over 600 real NHLPA players and their statistics. The inclusion of six international all-star teams lets you face-off against the powerful players of Russia, Sweden, and Canada. Two gameplay modes: Arcade - to get right on the ice for some in-your-face hockey, or Simulation - for real rules, penalties and exciting gameplay. Slap shots, wrist shots, one timers, crashing the boards, live action video clips and more - Play the world's best!
